subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Duke DA To Resign
body:
Duke lacrosse prosecutor Mike Nifong says he will resign as Durham County 
district attorney.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
